item.title: Mac Imageoptim Auto
item.description: I want to automatically convert pdf to jpg, and compress jpg. First, need to install ImageOptim, and put in Application folder. Then install ImageOptim-CLI to run ImageOptim in command line. # convert pdf to jpg sips --resampleWidth 1024 -s format jpeg *.pdf --out dist/ # compress all jpg in dist folder imageoptim dist
